article_title: ILWU, PMA reach tentative agreement on chassis maintenance and repair
article_text:
Register with JOC.com and read up to FIVE articles every thirty days. You can also subscribe to our daily newsletter.

Register

article_metadata.description: Negotiators for the Pacific Maritime Association and the International Longshore and Warehouse Union reached a tentative agreement on the chassis maintenance and repair issue that has been the major roadblock to reaching a new waterfront contract at West Coast ports.
